description:
Nobunaga hears about Yoshinari’s death as well as the fact that the Azai and Asakura forces are headed to Kyoto. He tries to make his way to Kyoto, but Kennyo attacks. Meanwhile, The Azai and Asakura forces try to take over Usayama Castle since Yoshinari no longer stands in their way but find that it more difficult than they had imagined.
Source: crunchyroll
